SELECT aui.UNIT_INFO_ID unitInfoId, aui.APPLICANT applicant, aui.UNIT_NATURE unitNature, aui.unified_social_credit_code unifiedSocialCreditCode, temp2.SERVICE_NAME serviceName, temp1.EVALUATION compEvaluation, temp1.biddingNum, aui.IMG_URL imgUrl, temp2.AUDIT_FLAG auditFlag FROM ( SELECT aius.UNIT_INFO_ID,aius.AUDIT_FLAG,
WM_CONCAT(ais.SERVICE_NAME) SERVICE_NAME
GROUP_CONCAT(ais.SERVICE_NAME) SERVICE_NAME
FROM AEA_IM_UNIT_SERVICE aius LEFT JOIN AEA_IM_SERVICE ais ON aius.SERVICE_ID = ais.SERVICE_ID WHERE aius.IS_DELETE = '0' AND aius.IS_ACTIVE = '1' AND aius.AUDIT_FLAG = '1' AND ais.IS_DELETE = '0' AND ais.IS_ACTIVE = '1' GROUP BY aius.UNIT_INFO_ID ) temp2 LEFT JOIN aea_unit_info aui ON temp2.UNIT_INFO_ID = aui.UNIT_INFO_ID LEFT join ( SELECT aiub.UNIT_INFO_ID,avg(aise.COMP_EVALUATION) as EVALUATION, count(1) biddingNum FROM aea_im_unit_bidding aiub LEFT JOIN aea_im_service_evaluation aise ON aise.UNIT_BIDDING_ID = aiub.UNIT_BIDDING_ID AND aise.AUDIT_FLAG = '1' AND aise.IS_DELETE = '0' WHERE aiub.IS_DELETE = '0' AND aiub.IS_WON_BID = '1' AND aiub.IS_CANCEL_SIGNUP = '0' GROUP BY aiub.UNIT_INFO_ID ) temp1 ON temp1.UNIT_INFO_ID = aui.UNIT_INFO_ID
aui.IS_DELETED = '0' AND aui.IS_IM_UNIT = '1'
AND aui.APPLICANT LIKE concat('%',concat(#{applicant},'%'))
AND aui.unitNature = #{unitNature}
AND aui.UNIT_INFO_ID IN ( SELECT aius1.UNIT_INFO_ID FROM AEA_IM_UNIT_SERVICE aius1 WHERE aius1.SERVICE_ID IN
#{item}
)
AND temp1.EVALUATION IS NULL
AND temp1.EVALUATION BETWEEN '0' AND '3'
AND temp1.EVALUATION BETWEEN '3' AND '4'
AND temp1.EVALUATION BETWEEN '4' AND '5'
ORDER BY
aui.CREATE_TIME DESC
aui.CREATE_TIME
,
temp1.EVALUATION DESC
temp1.EVALUATION
,
temp1.biddingNum DESC
temp1.biddingNum

aius.AUDIT_FLAG = '1' AND aius.IS_DELETE = '0' AND aius.IS_ACTIVE = '1'
